column4: Hi all, what is the comand for 're-configuring X' in ubuntu (dpkg-reconfigure ____ ?)
I am getting an error when installing the nvidia module:
Error: your X configuration has been altered.
This script cannot proceed automatically. If you believe that this
not correct, you can update the md5sum entry executing the following
what part of the error msg it gave you did you not understand
Shall I use the kernel framebuffer interface?
For nvidia, I shall not use glx right?
have you read the nvidia README like you should have?
I have read it, and also the ubuntulinux pages
but I was getting a dark black screen
that I attributed tdo the fact that hoary is still in testing
I doubt that because it states weather you need glx loaded or not
